entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
